message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be willing to do $105?
I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I can do $112, but I'm not getting any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $112?
I'm still not comfortable with that price, but I'm willing to make one more offer. Would you be willing to do $108?
I'm not getting any lower than $115, Bob. That's the lowest I'm willing to go. Would you be willing to meet me at $115?
